content.p: Fees for all Undergraduate courses, Postgraduate courses and Research programmes are different whether you are a Malaysian student or an International student. Scholarships and financial assistance are available to all Malaysian students and international students. Within the University, Faculty scholarships are also available. Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia University of Nottingham Malaysia DULN001(B) telephone: +6 03 8924 8000 fax: +6 03 8924 8005 course enquiries: +6 03 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays)
